title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.

a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
OB:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB:
a. The buttons should have a proper size.
b. When the dialog comes up, the first table entry should be selected, and only the relevant move buttons should be enabled.
c. The preview should not be cut off even when changing a parameter name to something very long.
d. The dialog should have an appropriate size for methods with many parameters.
SR:
1. Open the 'Modify Parameters' dialog.
2. Observe the size of the buttons.
3. Observe the selection of the table entry on dialog launch.
4. Change a parameter name to something very long and observe the preview.
5. Test the dialog with a method that has many parameters and observe its size.
